mapper.insert: insert into t_stu_grade (id, gradeStuId, gradeSubId, gradeStu, gradeLimit, gradeJudge, gradeAlterTime, gradeViolate) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gradeStuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gradeSubId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gradeStu,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gradeLimit,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gradeJudge,jdbcType=BIT}, #{gradeAlterTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gradeViolate,jdbcType=BIT})

mapper.select: select id, gradeStuId, gradeSubId, gradeStu, gradeLimit, gradeJudge, gradeAlterTime, gradeViolate from t_stu_grade where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
